skill.name: Freedom's Course
skill.value: Deals 3090/3690 DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK.

ability.name: Pilgrim Progenitor (Lv. 70)
ability.value: Sharply increases all allies' crit DMG when this daemon is Team Leader.

ability.name: Vessel of Freedom (Lv. 80)
ability.value: Slightly increases crit rate at the start of each wave.
